title: Episode 293: Anohni
description: “4 Degrees” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Anohni is a singer and songwriter originally from England, who started putting out music in 2000. She’s released 6 albums, and won the Mercury Prize. She’s also been nominated for two Brit Awards, and an Oscar. For this episode, I talked to her about […] The post Episode 293: Anohni appeared first on Song Exploder.
author: Tiger Biskup

title: Special Episode: Jeff Tweedy
description: “How to Write One Song” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS In June 2024, I got to go to the Solid Sound Festival in North Adams, Massachusetts, which is organized by the band Wilco. description: In an era where songs sadly have the shelf life of the TikTok trends that sprouted them, "Roses" has stood the test of time.

title: Sony Music Entertainment Japan acquires ‘full rights’ to Spookiz animation franchise
description: Sony Music Labels will work with South Korea's Keyring to produce new Spookiz animations. Source

title: Music publishers and Elon Musk’s X granted 90 day pause to copyright lawsuit for ‘good faith negotiations’ to try to settle out of court
description: Publishers 'to discuss with X the resolution of the suit and proper compensation to songwriters and publishers for past unlicensed uses, while providing an opportunity for go forward licensing,' says NMPA spokesperson Source
author: Daniel Tencer

title: Robin Thicke Sued for Posting Paparazzi Photos of Himself to Instagram
description: The singer and music producer joins the likes of Jennifer Lopez, Miley Cyrus and Dua Lipa in being sued for including allegedly unlicensed paparazzi pictures in social media posts.
author: Rachel Scharf

title: How EcoMusica & SonTierra Are Protecting Kids From Air Pollution and Climate Change With Music
description: Cumbia, banda, bolero, merengue, balada and Andean folk all play a part in the Moms Clean Air Force/EcoMadres initiative engaging families in environmental advocacy.
author: Ashley Iasimone
